languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, their damage dealt is increased by +<u>{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}</u>% until the end of their turn. Stacks up to 3 times.

languages.original_text: При применении {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывка{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Пляски смерти{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Пробежки{/g} или {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Смерти свыше{/g} наносимый персонажем {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% до конца его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Суммируется до 3 раз.

Stacks up to 3 times.

languages.text: Giyen kişi; {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Meşum Raks{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Atılım{/g} veya {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g} kabiliyetlerini kullandığında verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} +%{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb} kadar artar. Bu etki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi; {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Meşum Raks{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Atılım{/g} veya {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g} kabiliyetlerini kullandığında verdiği hasar +%<u>(ÇEV bonusu + ALG bonusu)</u> kadar artar. Bu etki turunun sonuna dek sürer. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.

Giyen kişi; {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Meşum Raks{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Atılım{/g} veya {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tepeden Yağan Ölüm{/g} kabiliyetlerini kullandığında verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} +%{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb} kadar artar. Bu etki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. 3 kez üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador usa {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danza macabra{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Carrera{/g} o {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que inflige aumenta en un +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador usa {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danza macabra{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Carrera{/g} o {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}, el daño que inflige aumenta en un +<u>(bonificación por AGI + bonificación por PER)</u> % hasta el final de su turno. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.

Cada vez que el portador usa {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danza macabra{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Carrera{/g} o {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Muerte desde el cielo{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que inflige aumenta en un +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}、{g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}死亡轮舞{/g}、{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}急速冲刺{/g}或{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}时，装备者造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高+{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}%。此效果最多可叠加3次，持续至装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}、{g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}死亡轮舞{/g}、{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}急速冲刺{/g}或{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}死从天降{/g}时，装备者造成的伤害都会提高<u>（敏捷加值+感知加值）</u>%。此效果最多可叠加3次，持续至装备者回合结束。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Totentanz{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprinten{/g} oder {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} einsetzt, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des Trägers bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} um +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% erhöht. Kann bis zu 3 Mal gestapelt werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Totentanz{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprinten{/g} oder {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} einsetzt, wird der Schaden des Trägers bis zum Ende seines Zuges um +<u>(BEW-Bonus + WAH-Bonus)</u> % erhöht. Kann bis zu 3 Mal gestapelt werden.

Wenn der Träger {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Totentanz{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprinten{/g} oder {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Tod von oben{/g} einsetzt, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des Trägers bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} um +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% erhöht. Kann bis zu 3 Mal gestapelt werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur utilise {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprint{/g} ou {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} augmentent de +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur utilise {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danse macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Sprint{/g} ou {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Mort venue du ciel{/g}, ses dégâts augmentent de +<u>(bonus d'AGI + bonus de PER)</u> % jusqu'à la fin de son tour. Cumulable jusqu'à 3 fois.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}突撃{/g}、{g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}死の舞踏{/g}、{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}ダッシュ{/g}、または{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}を使用する場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了まで使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}%増加する。最大3回までスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}突撃{/g}、{g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}死の舞踏{/g}、{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}ダッシュ{/g}、または{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}を使用する場合、ターンの終了まで使用者のダメージが+<u>（AGIボーナス+PERボーナス）</u>%増加する。最大3回までスタックする。

使用者が{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}突撃{/g}、{g|f:af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}死の舞踏{/g}、{g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}ダッシュ{/g}、または{g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}天からの死{/g}を使用する場合、ターンの終了まで使用者のダメージが+{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}%増加する。最大3回までスタックする。
